categories: Category:Songs by Figrin D'an and the Modal Nodes

nodes.text: The Sequential Passage of Chronological Intervals

"The Sequential Passage of Chronological Intervals" was a song originally performed by Gaeriel Capens and composed by a TribBot mimic series droid during the Clone Wars. It was later covered by Figrin D'an and the Modal Nodes during the Galactic Civil War.
